CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 3, 1960, pg. B7 reads: "County Fair Post Office Game - Mrs. Minerva Brice of 730 Adelaide St. is shown playing the "Ring-O-Zone" game for the first time as Postmaster James G. Smith looks on. This game will be available at the South Park County Fair.  There is no charge to play, and a gift will be given to anyone who successfully matches the zone number on a ring with the corresponding zone on the peg board. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Minerva Brice playing "Ring-O-Zone" with Postmaster James G. Smith, in interior with food products including Breakfast Cheer coffee, Clark candy bars, and cans of peaches
